sentence.Network_cn: 只要所有垂直面在一条线上，图案看起来就会很整齐。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French aligner, from à ligne 'into line'

encyclopedia.content: align 意思是 设定图像的对齐方式，其属性可选值为：top，bottom，middle，right，left等等。设置和显示效果如下图

entry.def: If you align yourself with a particular group, you support them because you have the same political aim.

example.ex: There are signs that the prime minister is aligning himself with the liberals...
example.tran: 有迹象表明首相正在与自由党人结盟。

example.ex: He has attempted to align the Socialists with the environmental movement.
example.tran: 他已试图争取社会党人支持环境运动。

entry.def: If you align something, you place it in a certain position in relation to something else, usually parallel to it.

example.ex: A tripod will be useful to align and steady the camera...
example.tran: 三脚架有助于调准和稳定相机。

example.ex: Keep the rough edge of the fabric aligned with the raw edge of the piping.
example.tran: 将织物的毛边与滚边未经加工的边对齐。

means.word_mean: 1. place in a line or arrange so as to be parallel or straight;

sentences.sentence: "align the sheets of paper on the table"

means.word_mean: 2. align with; be or come into adjustment
3. align oneself with a group or a way of thinking
4. bring (components or parts) into proper or desirable coordination correlation;

auth_sentence.content: Your asset allocation should align with your financial plan.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your asset allocation should align with your financial plan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your asset allocation should align with your financial plan.

auth_sentence.content: The magic comes when music and bodies align.
auth_sentence.res_content: The magic comes when music and bodies align.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The magic comes when music and bodies align.

auth_sentence.content: That will align his interests neatly with investors.
auth_sentence.res_content: That will align his interests neatly with investors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That will align his interests neatly with investors.

means.word_mean: 使成一线; 排整齐; 校准

sentences.en: Align the ruler and the middle of the paper.
sentences.cn: 使尺子与纸张的中部成一条直线。

means.word_mean: 公开支持(某人、集体或观点)

sentences.en: The senator aligned himself with the critics of the proposed reforms.
sentences.cn: 这位参议员公开支持对拟议的改革提出批评的人。
